articles.author: Bruce Haring
articles.title: ‘The View’ Cohost Whoopi Goldberg Claims ‘American Idol’ Led To ‘The Downfall Of Society’ - Deadline
articles.description: At age 67, The View cohost Whoopi Goldberg has seen a lot. She often doesn’t like what she sees, and she has finally discovered the root cause of much of society’s ills: the TV reality …
